mapper.insert: INSERT INTO GALLERY VALUES (GALLERY_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{postdate}, SYSDATE, SYSDATE, #{ip}, 0, #{image})
mapper.select: SELECT GALLERY_NO AS GALLERYNO , ID , TITLE , CONTENT , POSTDATE , LASTMODIFY , IP , HIT , IMAGE FROM GALLERY WHERE GALLERY_NO = ${_parameter}
